data.title: The Cannon: Data-driven method for determining stellar parameters and abundances from stellar spectra
data.name: TheCannon
data.description: a data-driven method for determining stellar parameters and abundances from stellar spectra

evidence: "This is the code associated with *The Cannon*, a data-driven method for determining stellar labels (physical parameters and chemical abundances) from stellar spectra in the context of large spectroscopic surveys."

Authors listed as individuals with affiliations ("Anna Ho", "Melissa Ness", etc.) and copyright statement: "Copyright 2015 the authors. TheCannon is open-source software released under the MIT License."

README presents it as a research method implementation with documentation and citation requirements, but gives no instructions for installation via package managers or binaries, implying use directly from the source repository.
